summary: The Promoting and Respecting Economically Vital American Innovation Leadership Act, or PREVAIL Act, aims to strengthen the U.S. patent system. It focuses on several key areas, including enhancing the Patent Trial and Appeal Board (PTAB), clarifying rules around inter partes and post-grant reviews to reduce perceived abuse, and addressing issues related to reexamination of patents. The bill also seeks to eliminate USPTO fee diversion, establish a revolving fund, and aid small businesses. Overall, it seeks to promote U.S. innovation and protect inventor rights.
